title: Subchapter A - Regulations of the Board of Trustees
content:
Subchapter A - Regulations of the Board of Trustees

State Regulations

Part 300 - Construction Standards (§ 300.1 to 300.6)

Part 301 - Supplemental Tuition Awards (§ 301.1 to 301.4)

Part 302 - Tuition, Fees and Charges (§ 302.1 to 302.19)

Part 303 - Payments To An Owner Or Tenant Of Residential Property Or Commercial Property Upon Their Application For Allowance Of Moving Expenses In Vacating Prope (§ 303.1 to 303.6)

Part 304 - Re-employment Of Retired Public Employees (§ 304.1 to 304.8)

Part 305 - Further Salary Adjustments-professional Service Employees (§ 305.1 to 305.4)

Part 306 - Reimbursement Of Relocation Expenses

Part 307 - Adjustment And Determination Of Salaries Of Professional Service Employees (§ 307.1 to 307.4)

Part 308 - Payment Of Salary Or Remuneration Or Unused Vacation Upon Resignation Or Retirement Or Upon Death While In Service (§ 308.1 to 308.3)

Part 309 - State University Group Disability Insurance Program (§ 309.1 to 309.10)

Part 310 - Participation Of State-operated Campuses Of State University In Interinstitutional Arrangements (§ 310.1)

Part 311 - Public Access To Records Of State University Of New York (§ 311.1 to 311.10)

Part 312 - Student Members Of College Councils (§ 312.1 to 312.2)

Part 313 - Procedures For Declaratory Rulings (§ 313.1)

Part 314 - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (§ 314.1 to 314.10)

Part 315 - Access To Personal Information Maintained By State University Of New York (§ 315.1 to 315.12)

Part 316 - State University Of New York Rules And Regulations For Purchasing And Contracting (§ 316.1 to 316.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
